title: Cloanto.C64.Forever.v2013.0.3.0.Plus.Edition-CRD
description:
Cloanto C64 Forever v2013.0.3.0 Plus Edition                
                                                                             
                                                                       
                     RLS.DATE.........2013/08/05                   
                       RLS.SIZE.........13x10.00MB                     
                                                                   
                      RLS.TYPE.............Keygen                     
                    PROTECTION...........Custom                  
                                                                 
                     PLATFORM.............WinAll                   
                                                                 
                                                                   
                                                                     
                                                                     
                                                                         
                                                                         
                            * RELEASE NOTES *                          
                                                                       
                C64 Forever embodies an intuitive                    
                player interface, backed by a                        
                built-in database containing more                    
                than 5,000 C64 game entries, and                     
                advanced support for the new RP9                     
                format, dubbed the "MP3 of                           
                retrogaming".                                        
                                                                     
                Give C64 Forever a try to bring back                 
                the Commodore 8-bit computing right                  
                on your desktop!                                     
                                                                     
                                                                     
                URL: http://www.cloanto.com                          
                                                                     
                                                                     
                                                                     
                           * iNSTALL NOTES *                         
                                                                     
                1.) Unpack all zips
                2.) Unpack rar
                3.) Install                               
                4.) Use our keygen to register                       
                5.) Enjoy!                                           
                                                                     
                NOTE: Generating a license key might                 
                take some time even on those highend                 
                super duper computers so please be                   
                patient.                                             
                                                                     
                If you can't understand how to install               
                or use this then please don't waste our              
                or anyone else time whining about bad                
                installation instructions.                           
                                                                     
                Instead of blaming us for delivering                 
                poor package try to read developer's                 
                FAQ or program's manual.
